author: Johan Raudales
title: ¡Histórico! San Marino, la peor selección del mundo, consigue su primer triunfo después de 20 años y 140 partidos
text: ¡SE ACABÓ! La peor selección del mundo, San Marino, acaba de vencer 1-0 a Liechtenstein por la Liga de Naciones del grupo D y consigue su primer triunfo después de 20 años y 140 partidos de espera. Con un solitario gol de Nicko Sensoli, San Marino acaba con la sequía y alcanzó sus primeros tres puntos en la historia de la Liga Naciones y se coloca en el primer puesto del grupo D. [Cristiano Ronaldo hizo historia en el fútbol: así fue su gol 900 en el Portugal - Croacia por la Liga de Naciones](https://www.diez.hn/internacionales/portugal-croacia-en-vivo-online-liga-naciones-gol-900-cristiano-ronaldo-transmision-hora-donde-ver-JH21269347) Un resultado que vale más que tres puntos y es que la última vez que San Marino había ganado un partido fue en el 2004 ante la misma selección de Liechtenstein. AMBOS HUNDIDOS EN EL RANKING FIFA De acuerdo con la última actualización del ranking de selecciones FIFA, se observó que los dos conjuntos europeos no levantan cabeza. Liechtenstein, apenas pudo escaparle a los últimos lugares: se coloca en el posición 199° con 835.83 puntos. En tanto que San Marino no pudo escalar, y se ubica en el fondo de la tabla: está último, en el puesto 210°, con 739.64 unidades.

author: @thecryptobasic
title: Why Ethereum’s Smart Contracts Are One of Its Best Features
text: Blockchain has emerged as a game-changing technology, disrupting numerous industries by providing a decentralized and safe solution for making transactions. One of the most common uses of blockchain is implementing smart contracts. But what are they, and how do they work? First of all, smart contracts have everything to do with Ethereum, the 2nd leading digital asset in the crypto market which you can buy on the [Binance](https://www.binance.com/en/price/ethereum) platform. Ethereum was also the one to bring the concept of automation to life and shape the future of blockchain technology. To be fair, trying to make sense of blockchain and all its related aspects can feel like an attempt to solve a Rubik’s cube in a room with no light – it’s truly daunting. If this concept is too complicated for you, we’re here to shine a light on smart contracts to help you grasp everything from how it functions to its benefits and the industries making the most of this new and appealing tech advancement. Breaking Down the Concept of Smart Contracts If you are familiar with the blockchain space, you may have heard about smart contracts before. But what are they, really? If you’re associating them with paper contracts – but smarter- you’re not wrong. Simply put, Ethereum smart contracts run on the Ethereum blockchain and are self-executing. This means that the terms of the agreement are written into code, executing automatically once specific conditions have been met. Smart contracts not only eliminate the need for an intermediary, but they also leave no room for misinterpretation. Since smart contracts automate contract execution, they save time and reduce the risk of human mistakes, making them ideal for different industries, including supply chain management, banking, and real estate. Some examples of Ethereum smart contracts include: - Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs). As the name suggests, these are companies run by smart contracts, operating based on rules written into the contract. - Decentralized Exchanges (DEXes). They are platforms that allow you to trade digital assets without requiring an intermediary.The smart contract is like a trusty referee that ensures everyone plays fair. - Initial Coin Offerings (ICOs). You can think of ICOs as fundraisers – except that you don’t sell car washes or cookies but cryptocurrencies. The smart contract’s role is to manage the sale to ensure all parties get their fair share. The Incredible Advantages of Ethereum Smart Contracts Ethereum smart contracts provide numerous benefits to individuals and businesses alike. They decrease transaction costs while boosting efficiency, as an intermediary is no longer needed. The smart contract does the entire job, acting like an efficient personal assistant who doesn’t make any errors. Due to their self-executing nature, smart contracts ensure that the agreement terms are enforced automatically, boosting transaction transparency and security. One of smart contracts’ highlights is the element of trust. Since they ensure prompt execution of transactions based on specified conditions, the possibilities for error, manipulation or human bias are significantly lower. More than 70% of executives see smart contracts as an innovative tool that will shape the future of business. Moreover, the market for DeFi apps built on the Ethereum blockchain has risen exponentially in only a few years, showing the potential of smart contracts to revolutionize how companies operate. Sectors That Are Making the Most of Ethereum Smart Contracts Ethereum smart contracts are used in different industries, including supply chain, real estate, gaming, FinTech, banking, etc. Smart contracts offer efficient solutions to these businesses, allowing them to operate as efficiently as possible. For instance, smart contracts streamline payroll processing in the HR sector, resulting in accurate and timely salary disbursement according to predefined conditions, including company policies and work hours. The technology of smart contracts can also benefit the recruitment process by encoding the terms of employment offers, thus resulting in transparent and seamless job acceptance processes. Healthcare is another sector where smart contracts are making their mark. By streamlining patient data management, smart contracts allow authorized healthcare providers to access essential information safely and promptly. Healthcare gains enormously from including blockchain smart contracts, and one of the most notable benefits is the potential to revolutionize clinical trial conduct. This is achieved by recording trial data safely and ensuring the results’ integrity and transparency. The gaming industry is also going through a transformation due to smart contracts that enhance players’ experiences and enable more autonomy by providing ownership of in-game assets represented by NFTs (non-fungible tokens). Smart contracts technology encourages fair play through the enforcement of game rules and governance of randomized events in an auditable and transparent way. Moreover, they enable play-to-earn models, which are an innovative monetization tool. Through their programmable nature, smart contracts blend digital activities with visible economic perks, automating the distribution of real-life rewards related to in-game actions. Are There Any Limitations in Adopting Smart Contracts? As much as we’d like to say smart contracts are perfect, that’s far from true. Although understanding how Ethereum smart contracts work unlocks many benefits, discussing the limitations is also imperative. Smart contracts are just like a coin – they have two different sides, and one of them is not so bright. Firstly, immutability is one of smart contracts’ main characteristics, meaning that once you create a contract, it is impossible to change it in any way. It’s like writing words in wet cement – they remain there forever. Well, the same applies to smart contracts, potentially representing a problem if conditions change or an error is made. Another limitation of smart contracts is associated with the legal framework. There are still many locations around the world where smart contracts’ legality is still ambiguous. It’s like exploring an unknown territory without any ideas of what could happen along the way. Moreover, the issue of privacy is also major. Think of it as living in a house that has glass walls – although it may look great, everyone can see inside, invading your privacy. And no, we aren’t talking metaphorically – your privacy is actually compromised due to Ethereum smart contracts transparency. Although it is perceived as a good thing -which it is, as it enhances trust – transparency allows all network users to see what you’re doing, which is less than ideal. Looking Towards the Future As reports show, the global smart contract market will reach $1.4 billion two years from now, an increase of 25.2% from 2020. There’s no doubt that Ethereum smart contracts hold great potential in the future, so we can expect to see further adoption, expansion of DApps, emergence of new use cases, and so on. Overall, we can expect Ethereum smart contracts to experience further development in the years to come. Follow Us on [Facebook.](https://www.facebook.com/thecryptobasic/) Disclaimer: This content is informational and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author's personal opinions and do not reflect The Crypto Basic’s opinion. Readers are encouraged to do thorough research before making any investment decisions. The Crypto Basic is not responsible for any financial losses. -Advertisement-

author: Redacción Depor MX
title: Toño Mauri: lo que se sabe de la bacteria que tiene en los pulmones
text:
Toño Mauri tiene una bacteria en los pulmones y su situación ha generado inquietud en su entorno más cercano y sus compañeros de la industria. El artista, uno de los más representativos de México, es un sobreviviente del COVID-19, ya que sobrevivió a la infección en 2020.
La celebridad tuvo un trasplante doble de pulmón para resistir a las consecuencias del coronavirus, durante la primera etapa de la pandemia, una de las más trágicas y que se llevó millones de vidas en todo el mundo.
De esta manera, desde hace tres años, Mauri es un agradecido por seguir respirando a pesar de su situación crítica de ese entonces. Sin embargo, en diciembre de 2023, informó que ha tenido una nueva complicación de su salud.
Le han detectado una bacteria en los pulmones. ¿Cuál es su estado de salud? ¿qué le dijeron los médicos sobre su diagnóstico? El mismo Toño Mauri lo contó en una entrevista al programa “Sale el Sol”.
¿POR QUÉ TOÑO MAURI TIENE UNA BACTERIA EN LOS PULMONES?
Toño Mauri contó que los médicos hallaron una bacteria en sus pulmones y que debe hacer un tratamiento de 50 días para evitar complicaciones en su salud, sobre todo por el trasplante doble de estos órganos que tuvo en 2020, al contagiarse de coronavirus.
“En mis últimos chequeos resultó que apareció una bacteria que es muy común en quienes tenemos un trasplante. Es una bacteria a la que hay que tenerle cuidado. El doctor prefirió que entremos en tratamiento antes de que pudiera hacer algún daño”, declaró en “Sale el Sol”.
¿Cuáles son las complicaciones que puede traer esta bacteria? Mauri explicó que esta se puede haber alojado en sus pulmones el mismo día del trasplante y que, de no hacer el tratamiento a tiempo, podría generarle incluso una neumonía.
“Es una bacteria agresiva y provoca abscesos en los pulmones o neumonía. El doctor prefirió que tomara el tratamiento. Me pusieron un catéter abajo de la piel que va directo al corazón, y el corazón distribuye el antibiótico a todo el cuerpo”, detalló.
¿CUÁL ES EL ESTADO DE SALUD DE TOÑO MAURI?
El estado de salud de Toño Mauri es estable, porque ya tiene el tratamiento adecuado para frenar los efectos de la bacteria en sus pulmones. Lo que sí pidió es fuerzas para superar sin problemas los 50 días de lucha contra la bacteria.

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: Boeing Workers Strike Over Contract Dispute, Halting Production | Headlines
text: Boeing Workers Strike Over Contract Dispute, Halting Production Boeing factory workers on the U.S. West Coast initiated a strike after rejecting a contract offer. The dispute, the first since 2008, has halted production of the 737 MAX jets amid regulatory scrutiny and financial distress. New CEO Kelly Ortberg faces a challenging labor-management battle. [Devdiscourse News Desk](/devdiscourse-stories)| Updated: 13-09-2024 14:07 IST | Created: 13-09-2024 14:07 IST Boeing's U.S. West Coast factory workers walked off the job early on Friday after overwhelmingly rejecting a contract deal, halting production of the planemaker's strongest-selling jet as it wrestles with severe output delays and heavy debt. The workers' first strike since 2008 comes as the planemaker is under heavy scrutiny from U.S. regulators and customers after a door panel blew off a 737 MAX jet mid-air in January. The mounting crises battered Boeing's stock and sparked a leadership upheaval. Boeing shares fell 3.4% in U.S. pre-market trading on Friday. New CEO Kelly Ortberg has to confront a labor-management battle just weeks after he was brought in to restore faith in the planemaker. He proposed a deal including a pay rise of 25% over four years, far lower than the 40% workers had demanded. Roughly 30,000 International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) members who produce Boeing's 737 MAX and other jets in the Seattle and Portland areas voted on their first full contract in 16 years, with 96% rejecting it and favoring a strike in a two-part ballot. "This is about respect, this is about addressing the past, and this is about fighting for our future," said Jon Holden, who headed the negotiations for Boeing's largest union, before announcing the vote result on Thursday evening. "We strike at midnight," said the union leader who had agreed to the just-defeated deal, as members in the union hall cheered and chanted: "Strike! Strike! Strike!" Boeing said late on Thursday the vote sent a clear message that the tentative deal it reached with IAM leadership was not acceptable to members. "We remain committed to resetting our relationship with our employees and the union, and we are ready to get back to the table to reach a new agreement," the planemaker said. The proposed deal also included a $3,000 signing bonus and a pledge to build Boeing's next commercial jet in the Seattle area, provided the program was launched within the four years of the contract. Although IAM leadership recommended last Sunday that its members accept the contract, many workers had responded angrily, arguing for the original demand and lamenting the loss of an annual bonus. (With inputs from agencies.) author: 编辑：梁波
title: 美国洛杉矶隧道坍塌 31人获救-国际频道-内蒙古新闻网
text:
新华社洛杉矶7月9日电（记者 高山 谭晶晶）美国加利福尼亚州洛杉矶市消防局9日说，在该市当日发生的一起隧道坍塌事故中救出31名被困人员。
洛杉矶消防局说，这31人都是隧道工人，所有人暂无明显伤势。消防局仍在核实被困人数，目前尚无人员失踪报告。
根据消防局发布的信息，这条隧道直径约5.5米，用于市政污水处理，坍塌发生在距离唯一入口以南约8至9公里的一处地下挖掘点。被困工人爬过一堆数米高的松散泥土，与坍塌点另一侧的几名同事会合后被救出。
洛杉矶市消防局当天派出超过100名工作人员前往现场，其中包括专门从事密闭空间救援的人员。

author: Javier Arroyo | Marktube
title: ¿Cuál fue la última publicación de la tiktoker colombiana que fue encontrada sin vida en la CDMX?
text:
En días pasados se dio a conocer que Asneydi Yurdisnevi García Garzón, una tiktoker de nacionalidad colombiana, fue encontrada sin vida en un departamento de la colonia Doctores , en la Ciudad de México . Asneydi García era una joven que solía hacer videos para la red social china TikTok .
¿Qué se sabe sobre su muerte? De acuerdo con diversos reportes, el dueño del departamento, un hombre llamado Juan González Oviedo , era quien le rentaba el inmueble a la joven junto a su novio de 48 años. Este acudió a la vivienda, pues tenía 15 días que no sabía nada de ella.
Te puede interesar: Ella es RoRo Bueno, la influencer de TikTok que ha sido señalada de sumisa
Al llegar al departamento ubicado en la calle Dr. Márquez número 76, se percató que del interior se desprendía un olor fétido. Al ingresar encontró el cuerpo sin vida de la joven tiktoker .
El hombre aseguró que la pareja de la joven tiktoker, Víctor Buitres Barrios , le reveló que tampoco había tenido contacto con la joven desde hace 15 días.
¿De qué murió la joven tiktoker? Paramédicos del ERUM acudieron al lugar para verificar el estado de la joven, percatándose que ya no tenía signos vitales (etiología desconocida), por lo que de inmediato dieron aviso al Ministerio Público (MP) de la Fiscalía General de Justicia de la Ciudad de México (FGJCDMX), el cual llevó a cabo el levantamiento del cuerpo.
Te puede interesar: Esta es la sorprendente historia del ‘Trend Mexa’ más viral de TikTok
La FGJCDMX investiga la muerte de Asneydi Yurdisnevi García Garzón bajo el protocolo de feminicidio . Se presume que la joven tenía al menos dos días de haber perdido la vida. La Fiscalía investiga a dos sujetos con los que fue vista por última vez y que, aparentemente, son de nacionalidad venezolana. De acuerdo con La Silla Rota, Asneydi presentaba marcas de violencia.
¿Quién era Asneydi Yurdisnevi García Garzón? La joven creadora de contenidos era originaria de Colombia y creaba contenido para Facebook y TikTok, donde se hacía llamar ‘La Muñeca’. Era fan del anime y difundía información relacionada a esto. La víctima era madre de un menor que dejó en su país natal.
¿Cuál fue la última publicación de la tiktoker? En uno de sus últimos videos, Asneydi utilizó un filtro que hacía lucir su rostro similar al de una muñeca . En la publicación aparece con el cabello recogido y una blusa negra con transparencias. La publicación la acompañó con el hashtag # muñeca .
